title: New: dd elle – love me only
content:
dd elle is already one of my favourite emerging artists of 2014.

With each track released, they seem to capture more and more attention, and not only that, but appear to be chiselling out a sound entirely their own. Newest release love me only has already received praise from numerous top respected blogs, and acts as a forward to the debut dd elle EP, expected later this year. Another slick of squelchy odd-pop, it’s unique in texture and composition. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
